title: Exploring Research Ethics in Informal Learning Environments: The MUITEL Study

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Concepts of Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) and Practical Experience in Mathematics Education
context.additional_context: Exploring ethical issues in informal learning within smartphone-based microlearning environments. Designing a research ethics framework based on elementary school teachers' practical experiences in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more ethical issues that may arise when applying MUITEL in informal learning environments.
Learners can suggest two or more learner privacy protection measures when designing mobile technology-based mathematics education.
Learners can present one or more procedures to resolve ethical dilemmas that may occur in microlearning activities for small learner groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
